infos.name: Accessibe Integration by WSNYC
infos.description:
The plugin for Shopware integration with Accessibe is an effective tool that makes websites more accessible to individuals with disabilities. The plugin is easy to install and provides a seamless integration, allowing to implement Accessibe's AI-powered accessibility features with just a few clicks and manage the settings directly from Shopware Admin Panel.


The plugin's easy-to-use interface allows for seamless integration with Shopware websites, enabling website Admins to quickly and efficiently configure the widget's appearance and functionality directly from the Shopware admin panel.


Using Accessibe you can ensure that websites are fully compliant with web accessibility standards and regulations, improving website usability and accessibility. This leads to reaching a wider audience by making your website more accessible to individuals with disabilities, improving the overall user experience, and ultimately increasing customer satisfaction. What is also important, having your website compliant with accessibility standards and regulations is extremely helpful to prevent potential legal issues related to web accessibility, such as lawsuits or fines.
infos.installationManual:
Plugin manual is available here.

To activate the integration, go to https://dashboard.accessibe.com/ You can sign up to a trial account to test during configuration/set-up.
infos.shortDescription: Enhance your Shopware 6 website's accessibility effortlessly with this Accessibe integration module. Comply with accessibility standards, reach more customers, and improve usability.
infos.highlights:
Seamlessly integrate Accessibe with Shopware.
Manage the settings directly from Admin Panel.
Meet the web accessibility standards and regulations.
Improve user experience.
Avoid potential legal issues related to web accessibility, such as lawsuits or fines.
infos.features:
Interface Customizations from Shopware Admin (configure lead color, footer content, position, statement link, interface language).
Trigger Customizations from Shopware Admin (configure hiding trigger button, color, vertical and horizontal positions, vertical and horizontal offset, button shape and size).
Mobile Customizations from Shopware Admin (configure hiding button on mobile, color, vertical and horizontal positions, vertical and horizontal offset, button shape and size).

changelog.text:
Features added:

  • Interface Customizations from Shopware Admin (configure lead color, footer content, position, statement link, interface language).
  • Trigger Customizations from Shopware Admin (configure hiding trigger button, color, vertical and horizontal positions, vertical and horizontal offset, button shape and size).
  • Mobile Customizations from Shopware Admin (configure hiding button on mobile, color, vertical and horizontal positions, vertical and horizontal offset, button shape and size).
